name: Platformer Creator 1.0
description:
wait for blocks to be created

You can delete a block by pressing the 0 key.

You can put the grass block by pressing 1

You can put earth block by pressing 2

You can put stone block by pressing 3

You can put the thorn block by pressing the 4 key

(if you touch the thorn you will die)

You can put lava by pressing 5

(if you touch the lava you will die)

You can put water by pressing the 6 key

(if you touch the water you will die)

You can put ice by pressing the 7 key

(if you touch the ice you will speed up)

You can put a green flag by pressing 8

(if you touch the green flag you win the game)

Click on the green flag in the upper left corner to play the platform you made. Movement: WASD and ARROW KEYS
